_metadata.description: U.S. Government Shutdowns that resulted in employee furloughs
_metadata.notes: Only includes shutdowns that caused federal employee furloughs. Update this file when new shutdowns occur.

shutdowns.title: 2025 Government Shutdown
shutdowns.description: 43-day shutdown during Trump's second presidency. Longest in U.S. history.

shutdowns.title: 2018-2019 Government Shutdown
shutdowns.description: 35-day partial shutdown over U.S.-Mexico border wall funding.

shutdowns.title: January 2018 Shutdown
shutdowns.description: 3-day shutdown over DACA and immigration policy.

shutdowns.title: 2013 Government Shutdown
shutdowns.description: 16-day shutdown over Affordable Care Act implementation.

shutdowns.title: November 1995 Shutdown
shutdowns.description: 5-day shutdown over budget disputes with Republican Congress.

shutdowns.title: 1995-1996 Government Shutdown
shutdowns.description: 21-day shutdown over Medicare and budget cuts.
